speaker: Shadow
dialog: Thank You for making it out.

speaker: Shadow
dialog: Yes, I am always with you.

speaker: Shadow
dialog: I have seen and felt the monsters that haunt you..

speaker: Shadow
dialog: Thank you for never giving up, thank you for always pushing forward even when it seems you are lost and only surrounded by pain

speaker: Shadow
dialog: I, like many others, love you.

speaker: Shadow
dialog: I will always be here for you.
